languages.text: {n}Тишина в воксе царит несколько секунд.{/n} "Допускаю. Мог успеть нанять какую-то шваль... или же это просто пиратье, которое заметило наши повреждения и решило попытать удачу".
{n}The silence over the vox lasts for several seconds.{/n} "It's possible. He could have hired some scum... or maybe it's just a pirate who saw the state of our ship and decided to push his luck."
languages.original_text: {n}Тишина в воксе царит несколько секунд.{/n} "Допускаю. Мог успеть нанять какую-то шваль... или же это просто пиратье, которое заметило наши повреждения и решило попытать удачу".

traits.locale_text: {n}The silence in the vox lasts for several seconds.{/n} "It is possible. He could have hired some scum... or maybe it s just a pirate who saw the state of our ship and decided to push his luck."
{n}The silence in the vox lasts for several seconds.{/n} "It is possible. He could have hired some scum... or maybe it s just a pirate who saw the state of our ship and decided to push his luck."

{n}The silence over the vox lasts for several seconds.{/n} "It's possible. He could have hired some scum... or maybe it's just a pirate who saw the state of our ship and decided to push his luck."

languages.text: {n}ヴォクス間の沈黙が数秒続く。{/n}「考えられますね。奴はクズ共を雇ったかもしれません…あるいは、我々の船の状態を見て、運試しをしようと決心した海賊なのかもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}The silence over the vox lasts for several seconds.{/n} "It's possible. He could have hired some scum... or maybe it's just a pirate who saw the state of our ship and decided to push his luck."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクス間の沈黙が数秒続く。{/n}「考えられますね。奴はクズ共を雇ったかもしれません…あるいは、我々の船の状態を見て、運試しをしようと決心した海賊なのかもしれません」

languages.text: {n}Le vox reste silencieux quelques instants.{/n} « C'est pas impossible. Il pourrait bien avoir embauché des truands... ou bien ce sont juste des pirates qui ont vu l'état de notre vaisseau et ont décidé de tenter leur chance. »
languages.original_text: {n}The silence over the vox lasts for several seconds.{/n} "It's possible. He could have hired some scum... or maybe it's just a pirate who saw the state of our ship and decided to push his luck."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox reste silencieux quelques instants.{/n} « C'est pas impossible. Il pourrait bien avoir embauché des truands... ou bien ce sont juste des pirates qui ont vu l'état de notre vaisseau et ont décidé de tenter leur chance. »

languages.text: {n}音阵装置沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“有可能，说不定是他雇佣了一群渣滓……也说不定只是一群普通的海盗，打算找咱们来碰碰运气。”
languages.original_text: {n}The silence over the vox lasts for several seconds.{/n} "It's possible. He could have hired some scum... or maybe it's just a pirate who saw the state of our ship and decided to push his luck."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵装置沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“有可能，说不定是他雇佣了一群渣滓……也说不定只是一群普通的海盗，打算找咱们来碰碰运气。”

languages.text: {n}El silencio a través del voco dura varios segundos.{/n} «Puede ser. Podría haber contratado a algún indeseable... o quizá sea un pirata que haya visto el estado de nuestra nave y se haya dicho a ver qué cae».
languages.original_text: {n}The silence over the vox lasts for several seconds.{/n} "It's possible. He could have hired some scum... or maybe it's just a pirate who saw the state of our ship and decided to push his luck."

traits.locale_text: {n}El silencio a través del voco dura varios segundos.{/n} «Puede ser. Podría haber contratado a algún indeseable... o quizá sea un pirata que haya visto el estado de nuestra nave y se haya dicho a ver qué cae».

languages.text: {n}Das Vox ist mehrere Sekunden lang vollkommen still.{/n} "Es ist möglich. Er hätte irgendeinen Abschaum anheuern können ... oder vielleicht ist es nur ein Pirat, der den Zustand unseres Schiffs gesehen hat und sein Glück versuchen will."
languages.original_text: {n}The silence over the vox lasts for several seconds.{/n} "It's possible. He could have hired some scum... or maybe it's just a pirate who saw the state of our ship and decided to push his luck."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox ist mehrere Sekunden lang vollkommen still.{/n} "Es ist möglich. Er hätte irgendeinen Abschaum anheuern können ... oder vielleicht ist es nur ein Pirat, der den Zustand unseres Schiffs gesehen hat und sein Glück versuchen will."

languages.text: {n}Birkaç saniye boyunca vokstan çıt çıkmıyor.{/n} "Olası. Şerefsizleri parayla tutmuş olabilir... Belki de gemimizin hâlini gören bir korsan, fırsattan istifade saldırmaya karar vermiştir."
languages.original_text: {n}The silence over the vox lasts for several seconds.{/n} "It's possible. He could have hired some scum... or maybe it's just a pirate who saw the state of our ship and decided to push his luck."

traits.locale_text: {n}Birkaç saniye boyunca vokstan çıt çıkmıyor.{/n} "Olası. Şerefsizleri parayla tutmuş olabilir… Belki de gemimizin hâlini gören bir korsan, fırsattan istifade saldırmaya karar vermiştir."
